data.meta_description: A selected list of awards, honors, and prizes for Isaac Bashevis Singer's work.
data.text:
Newberry Honor Book Awards, 1968 & 1969

National Book Awards, 1970 & 1974

American Institute of Arts and Letters Arts and Letters Award in Literature, 1959

American Institute of Arts and Letters Gold Medal in Fiction, 1989

Louis Lamed Prize, 1950 & 1956

Epstein Fiction Award, 1963

Daroff Memorial Award, 1963

Edgar Allen Poe Award: Raven Award for Reader of the Year, 1983

Sacred Heart University Honorary Doctor of Humane Letters, November 1978

Jersey City State College Honorary Doctor of Hunane Letters, June 1981

University of Central Florida Honorary Doctor of Letters, May 1986

Long Island University Doctor of Letters, Honoris Causa, June 1978

New York University Honorary Doctor of Letters, June 1980

Carnegie-Melon University Honorary Doctor of Humane Letters, May 1978

University of Connecticut Honorary Doctor of Letters, May 1985
